author: Maya Phillips
title: The upbeat anime Cells at Work! is a cure for coronavirus blues
description: Amid the COVID-19 pandemic, the popular anime series Cells at Work!, available to watch on Crunchyroll and Netflix, feels like the best antidote for coronavirus depression: it’s a show that personifies all the ways the human body fights off disease.
content: With a pandemic spreading through our global community, its hard to avoid increased mentions of peoples bodies. Some of the endless media and medical talk treats bodies as sobering metonymic abstractions, representing countless unidentified sick or dead peopl… [+6272 chars]
